short_summary: Shelving units for A L S E
description: PWGSC on behalf of Department of National Defense (DND), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of shelving units and workstations to store serviceable Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE) parts and tools including the delivery located in Greenwood, Nova Scotia, Canada, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
### Tender for Shelving Units and Workstations
#### Title:
**W0102-23502S Shelving Units for Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE)**

#### Government Tender Details:

* **Reference Number:** WS4300131302-Doc4300517340
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4300131302
* **Publication Date:** November 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None

#### Tender Status:
The tender is cancelled.

#### Procurement Details:

* **UNSPSC Classification:* 24102000 - Shelving and storage
* **Procurement Category:** GD
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Location:
The tender requires the delivery of shelving units and workstations to store serviceable Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE) parts and tools in Greenwood, Nova Scotia, Canada.

#### Trade Agreements:
This tender is open to bidders who comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information:
* **Contract Originator:** St-Hilaire Castonguay, Gabrielle
* **Email:** gabrielle.st-hilairecastonguay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Reference:** PWGSC (Public Works and Government Services Canada)

#### Notice URL:
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17966903?extsite=MTc5NjY5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Description:
The Department of National Defense (DND) requires the acquisition of shelving units and workstations to store serviceable Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE) parts and tools, as detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirement.
